name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AWS Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing and maintaining high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Highly skilled in **AWS**, **CI/CD**, and **Jenkins**, with extensive knowledge of **Terraform** and **AWS CDK** for infrastructure as code (IaC). Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems and managing CI/CD pipelines, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.
Exceptional in automating testing and monitoring processes using tools like **Selenium**, **Snyk**, **Sentry**, and **SumoLogic**, enabling rapid deployment cycles while ensuring compliance with industry standards.
Recognized for my strong programming foundation in **Python** and scripting via **Bash** and **Groovy**, as well as my hands-on experience in both frontend and backend technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. Committed to building innovative solutions and guiding teams through compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA and PCI DSS standards.
